fields.label: Wrote the buyer path as 8 to 12 steps
fields.helperText: Provide your buyer path steps from first contact to intake completion.

fields.label: Marked the top 5 friction points
fields.helperText: List five friction points with one-line explanations.

fields.label: Created a cut list with at least 7 simplifications
fields.helperText: List at least 7 simplifications you will make.

fields.label: Selected the top 3 cuts to implement today
fields.helperText: Name your top 3 cuts and one-line reasons for each.

fields.label: Rewrote the headline and promise sentence
fields.helperText: Paste the updated headline and one-sentence promise.

fields.label: Rewrote the top 5 bullets as simple deliverables
fields.helperText: List 5 deliverable bullets in plain language.

fields.label: Rewrote the DM script to match the new copy
fields.helperText: Paste the updated DM script aligned to the new copy.

fields.label: Added one mismatch-prevention sentence
fields.helperText: Write one sentence that prevents mismatch.

fields.label: Implemented the top 3 cuts in your assets
fields.helperText: List the 3 changes with before/after lines.

fields.label: Updated your launch kit document
fields.helperText: Paste the updated launch kit key sections or outline.

fields.label: Updated your tracker fields or workflow steps if needed
fields.helperText: Paste updated tracker headings or workflow steps showing the simplification.

fields.label: Created a new version tag with change notes
fields.helperText: Write the version tag and 3 change notes.

fields.label: Selected the first payment or strongest commitment event
fields.helperText: Write one sentence describing the event (payment, intake request, strong reply, scheduled call).

fields.label: Captured proof of the event
fields.helperText: Paste the receipt details, copied message text, or a precise proof description.

fields.label: Wrote the path that led to it as 6 to 10 steps
fields.helperText: Provide 6 to 10 numbered steps showing the path to the event.

fields.label: Recorded the offer version tag used
fields.helperText: Write the version tag and where it was used (page, DM, post).

fields.label: Wrote a why-they-said-yes paragraph
fields.helperText: Paste 120 to 180 words explaining why the person said yes (or almost said yes).

fields.label: Listed 5 factors that reduced buyer risk
fields.helperText: List 5 risk-reduction factors (scope, timeline, clarity, proof, trust).

fields.label: Listed 3 friction points that still exist
fields.helperText: List 3 friction points you observed.

fields.label: Chose 3 improvements with owner and deadline
fields.helperText: Write three improvement lines with owner (you) and a deadline date.

fields.label: Wrote a 7-day schedule with daily actions
fields.helperText: List Day 1 to Day 7 actions in one line each.

fields.label: Set 5 weekly metric targets
fields.helperText: Write 5 metrics and numeric weekly targets (for example, outreach sent: 30).

fields.label: Drafted a feedback request message for the buyer or lead
fields.helperText: Paste a short feedback request message.

fields.label: Updated your launch log with a next version note
fields.helperText: Paste the launch log line that states what you will change next and why.
